channel.title: How to make claws emote faster?

item.title: How to make claws emote faster?
item.dc:creator: @prism5556 prism5556
item.description:
@prism5556 wrote:

First of all, this is delta based. Iâ€™m guessing this has to do something with the emote in class20.java?..
Anyways, heres my code.

if(j == 6000) { //Dragon claws int file = 1919; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = { 75, 75, 62, 62, 93, 93, 93, 82, 82, 57, 57, 71, 71, 66, 66, 66, 61, 92, 73, 73, 65, 65, 89, 89, 70, 70, 81, 81, 67, 67, 67, 84, 59, 63, 63, 99, 99, 78, 69, 69, 96, 96, 74, 74, 74, 79, 90, 90, 94, 94, 58, 0 }; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++) { aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 0; } }
